name: Dog Days (Nick A. Spyrakos, farukosm, Ryan Shin, MarcusHagg)
name_original: Dog Days (Nick A. Spyrakos, farukosm, Ryan Shin, MarcusHagg)
description:
Dog Days 

Dog Days is a short, self-contained, top-down shoot 'em up, designed around the prompt "Building strong connections" for Uppsala University's Game Design Programme. This is a first year's project that was designed & developed in a period of 8 weeks. 

Controls
  • Movement: WASD
  • Shoot: Left Click
  • Interact: E
  • Pet Dog: F
Dog Commands
  • Sit: C
  • Come: Right Click
  • Ability: Q
